name: Puffins: Let's Fish!
description:
It’s an all-you-can-eat feast across 18 levels as you avoid dangerous predators to fill your belly with delicious fish.

Dive into the deep blue sea and fill your belly with delicious fish in PUFFINS: LET’S FISH! This action game has you swimming the beautiful ocean looking for a puffin’s favorite meal—the elusive capelin. But watch out! The ocean can be a dangerous place and you’re not the only one hunting for food. Sharks, jellyfish and other fearsome predators are just waiting to take a bite out of you. It’s an all-you-can-eat feast in two different and exciting gameplay modes across 18 underwater stages. So be careful, take a deep breath, jump in and come out with a full belly! Yum!
